## ReturnInfo type

Stores information about returns connected to this order.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ReturnInfo = {
    __typename?: "ReturnInfo";
    items: Array<ReturnItem>;
    returnTrackingId?: Maybe<Scalars["String"]>;
    returnDate?: Maybe<Scalars["DateTime"]>;
};
```
